<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hierophant's Power](/Feats.aspx?ID=4765) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You have entwined yourself with the natural world, and its full power flows through you. You gain an additional 10th-rank spell slot.
name: Hierophant's Power
